name: Unsolved Case: Episode 4 - F2P
description:
“Fatal Romance” is the fourth of a great murder story of the “Unsolved Case” investigation games series! Find hidden objects and investigate criminal case files in one of the best detective games! Solve the puzzles, escape room with the characters, make decisions that affect the plot and games, unravel the mystery and find out how the next episode ends! Not only the great storyline with a lot of secrets will delight you, but also the fact that the game is completely free!

Hypocrisy - the plague of the 21st century. One can play music without facing consequences, but never play with people. In this story, reunite with already familiar characters to solve exciting new puzzles and unveil secrets. Meet some new bright personalities from the industry of show business and determine who killed a sax player right in the middle of a gig in a fancy jazz-club, and for what reason. However, to do so, you will have to face your own deepest fears…

. SAVOR THE ENTICING STORY FULL OF UNEXPECTED PLOT TWISTS!
Dynamically developing plot with investigation of criminal cases certainly will not leave you indifferent! Spend your time with pleasure playing murder mystery games and find the hidden objects.

. MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICES AND SEE WHERE THEY LEAD. BETTER THINK TWICE!
You have the ability to choose character phrases for an action on which the investigation depends. Influence the plot of the detective quest, solve the murder mystery and see what comes of it all!

. CONDUCT YOUR OWN INVESTIGATION AND EARN ACHIEVEMENTS!
Solve the puzzles and find the objects in the unsolved mystery games. Also, it's in your best interest to figure out all the suspects by trying to get into their criminal minds. This will all help you earn numerous achievements to highlight your success!

. PLAY THIS EPISODE OF THE UNSOLVED SERIES TO BE FULLY PREPARED FOR THE NEXT ONE!
Each game is an episode of one murder mystery story. Make your way through this game, solving criminal case files and looking for hidden objects to move on to the next episode and find out what came next.

As you progress through the episodes, you'll be able to conduct crime investigations and solve a lot of mysterious cases! Finish one series and move on to the next, but if you feel stuck or don’t want to solve a mini-game, you may buy hints to help you proceed quicker!
